Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Mrs. Robinson's life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that she was likely married.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Mrs. Robinson joined a community called the Alexandria Safe Zone . Mrs. Robinson is in the gardens arguing with Barbara when Michonne steps in to break up their fight. Following the six-year time jump, Mrs. Robinson has not been seen in Alexandria, suggesting she either left the community or died due to unknown causes.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Mrs. Robinson has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
Trivia[]: The actress was asked for her availability for Season 10, indicating that her character was considered still alive after the 6 year time skip in Season 9, but she has not appeared in any episodes. Additionally, the actress had a recurring role on Black Lighting during the time of filming for Season 10, thus leaving her unavailable to make an appearance as Mrs. Robinson.
Name: Mrs. Robinson
